Introduction
This topic contains information on determining eligibility for the plot or interment allowance, including
general eligibility for plot or interment allowance
amount payable for plot or interment allowance
plot or interment allowance for burial in
a State Veterans cemetery or on tribal trust land
, and
other than a State cemetery, tribal trust land, or national Veterans cemetery
contributions by government, public, tribal, or private organizations
eligible claimant’s loyalty clearance when buried in a State Veterans cemetery
how to process claims for State or tribal land plot or interment allowance benefit
establishing debts against State Veterans cemeteries or tribal cemeteries
, and
automated State plot batch process
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B  - Burial Benefits
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
